thread.title: Hilary Duff looked like the queen of the Emerald City at the Golden Globes after-party
thread.title_full: Hilary Duff looked like the queen of the Emerald City at the Golden Globes after-party

author: Olivia Harvey
title: Hilary Duff looked like the queen of the Emerald City at the Golden Globes after-party
text:
Hilary Duff looked like the queen of the Emerald City at the Golden Globes after-party Ah, awards season. It‚Äôs the time of year when we get to see some pretty remarkable fashion. Last night at the 74th Golden Globe Awards, the fashion truly was remarkable. And what‚Äôs more is that the after-party fashion was just as good ‚Äî if not better than some red carpet ensembles!
Our best friend, Hilary Duff, decked out in an emerald green dream , arrived to the 18th Annual Post-Golden Globes Party hosted by Warner Bros. Pictures and InStyle looking like one of the classiest women we have ever seen. Did that rhyme? Huh.
The Younger star was put into this simple -yet-elegant pillar dress by celeb stylist, Anita Patrickson. Patrickson and Duff paired the dress with Lee Savage‚Äôs ‚ÄúInfinite Space‚Äù gold clutch , a chunky gold ring and matching earrings.
Getty Images / C Flanigan We‚Äôre loving the fact that this purse makes Duff look like she‚Äôs carrying a solid bar of gold with her. Now that‚Äôs posh, amiright? Last night... @instylemagazine ... @anitapatrickson I loved my green number ü•íü•ë @rommynajor and @nikkilee901 dolled me up ‚ù§Ô∏è 
A photo posted by Hilary Duff (@hilaryduff) on Jan 9, 2017 at 10:18am PST 
Duff‚Äôs hair was done by stylist, Nikki Lee, and we‚Äôre getting some modern Lizzy McGuire vibes from those bangs. They‚Äôre bangin‚Äô bangs for sure. @hilaryduff giving me serious ponytail goals! hair: @nikkilee901 makeup: @rommynajor #hair #makeup #redcarpet #hilaryduff #celebritystylist #celebritystyle #goldenglobes #lovemyjob 
A video posted by anitapatrickson (@anitapatrickson) on Jan 9, 2017 at 6:34am PST 

And as much fun as The Golden Globes look is, the after-parties are where the fun fun is at! Celebs mix and mingle with their other celeb friends. They fanboy/fangirl over other equally famous actors and actresses. These parties are the places to be post-Globes.
Duff and dancer Julianne Hough hung out at the Warner Bros./InStyle party. If you want to know why they both look so amazing, it‚Äôs because they were both styled by Anita Patrickson. Hey, she‚Äôs a celeb stylist for a reason! Getty Images / Stefanie Keenan And Duff even took time away from ruling her emerald empire to take photos with fans. One such fan was Scream Queens actress, Keke Palmer. Palmer Instagrammed her evidence and captioned it ‚ÄúKIDS. Dead.‚Äù
We would be, too, honestly. KIDS. Dead. #goldenglobes 
A photo posted by Laurennnn Palmer (@kekepalmer) on Jan 8, 2017 at 10:15pm PST 
Okat, so now we know that the post-show after-parties are the places to be seen. That gives us a whole year to become famous enough to gain entrance to party our butts off Hilary Duff. If we play our cards right, maybe Duff will let us borrow her green number for next year‚Äôs festivities. Fingers crossed!
